casebody.data:
STANDARD OIL COMPANY OF NEW JERSEY, Appellee, v. UNIVERSAL INSURANCE COMPANY, Appellant. No. 57. Oircuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Nov. 6, 1933. For opinion below, see 3 F. Snpp. 564. Single, Atkins, Middleton & Tyler, of New York City (Loring R. Leeraw and For-i'est E. Single, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Charles R. Hickox and Clement C. Rinehart, both of New York City, for appellee.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Affirmed on opinion below.
